transcript:
Customer: Ji namaste IndiaMART se bol rahe ho?

Executive: Om bhur bhuva swaha tatsavitur

Customer: Haan ji. Hello. Haan ji haan ji sir.

Executive: Raman ji aapko jaise leads aati hai na, sari irrelevant ya aise system se generate hoke aati hai. AI system se jo leads generate hoti hai sir wo AI aur recent activity ke through generate hoti hai. Aap kisi particular category mein agar leads ko zyada use kar rahe ho, to aapko usi category ki lead aati hai. AI system usko track karta hai.

Executive: Similarly sir aapko na lead manager pe ek feedback ka option aata hai. Aap wahan se sir feedback jaise hi share karenge apna, jo bhi irrelevancy wali leads hai aapke unke.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Sir wo feedback hum logon ke paas aa payega jisse hum understand kar payenge ye issues aa rahe hain in tarike se inke. To sir wo feedback jaise hi milega humko hum log aapke next three working days mein sir aapke paas us tarike ki leads nahi aayengi aage se.

Customer: Matlab is tarike ki matlab main samjha nahi.

Executive: Sir aapka feedback aayega na to hume pata chal payega na cheezon ko leke ki ye issues aa rahe hain. Aap agar sir feedback hi nahi share karenge.

Customer: Nahi hello hello meri baat suno.

Customer: Is jo jo caption hai wo to hamari range ke hi hain.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Matlab customer hai pata nahi kya matlab fake fake jo customer hai wo fake type ka hai.

Executive: Okay. To sir jab aap main abhi ye bata raha hun.

Executive: Jab aap lead consume karte the sir wahan customer ki detail bhi aapko di hoti hai. Aap wo sab proper check karke karte ho?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Okay. Sir aap buyer ki detail bhi check karte ho proper filters lagate ho?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: No worry sir aapko next time se is tarike ki lead dekhne ke liye nahi aayengi. Aap iska feedback share kariye. Lead manager pe jaaiye. Ye pehle se baat hui na aapke WhatsApp pe share karke aapke bande se baat hui aapki?

Customer: Haan ji?

Executive: Jo aapne main agli baar dekhta hun phir karta hun aise hi karta hun. Sir jaise aapne abhi jo abhi screenshot share kara hai aap aapki is bande se baat ho gayi na?

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Haan to wo kya bol raha hai aapko?

Customer: Nahi main kehta main kehta maine dali nahi.

Executive: Haan to theek hai sir aap lead manager pe jaaiye ek baar.

Customer: Haan. Lead manager pe jaaiye. Haan ye lead open kariye jo lead se aapki baat hui hai abhi.

Customer: Do minute. Wo open kariye.

Executive: Ho gaya open?

Customer: Do minute do minute.

Executive: Ji ji. Sir lead kholna.

Executive: Ji. Okay wo lead

Customer: Lead manager.

Executive: Ji.

Customer: Sahil Kumar.

Executive: Ji. Open kariye usko. Haan. Sir dekhiye wahan jo first message hoga uske just niche likha hoga is this buylead relevant ya phir is this buylead useful. Thumbs up aur thumbs down ka option aa raha hoga. Aa raha hai? Haan ji haan ji. Hmm.

Executive: Sir thumbs down pe click kariye.

Customer: Red wala?

Executive: Haan red wale pe. Haan ji.

Executive: Hmm. Abhi kya kya option aaye?

Customer: Koi bhi nahi aaya.

Executive: Kya sir?

Customer: Kuch nahi aaya.

Executive: Sir wahan option aaya hoga na client fake hai ya phir kya hai comment box option ho gaya hoga. Wahan pe comment box mein likhiye ke agar client is fake they don't have any kind of requirement. He was telling that he cannot post any requirement. Client ne aapse ye bola na ki usne koi requirement post nahi kari abhi.

Customer: Aap wahan likhiye. Aisa kuch aa hi nahi raha.

Executive: Sir wahan jaise hi aap red wala thumb connect kar rahe hain click kar rahe hain na uska aa raha hoga likha hua. Option open hua hoga sir.

Customer: Nahi hua na.

Executive: Aisa ho hi nahi sakta sir jab aap open karenge to wahan option aayega sir.

Customer: Nahi aa raha.

Executive: Ah sir could you find a minute sir agar main link share karke abhi join kara ke aapko wo dikha paun?

Customer: Haan ji. Main aapko aise hi pic send karta hun.

Executive: Haan mere ko WhatsApp pe share kariye. Short mein call kariye.

Executive: Kariye share.

Executive: Just a minute. Haan sir ispe click kariye red wale pe.

Executive: Red wale pe click ho gaya?

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Raman sir jo red wala aa raha hai na thumb down ka option us pe aap click kariye.

Customer: Kispe?

Executive: Jo red wala option aa raha hai na feedback submit. Okay okay okay. Sir aapka feedback already submitted hai iske liye.

Customer: Kya cheez hai?

Executive: Aapne sir already red wale pe connect kar diya to not relevant pe wo feedback submit ho gaya hai.

Customer: Achha theek hai okay theek hai.

Executive: Aapko sir isi tarike se har lead ka feedback share karna hai yahan pe theek hai?

Customer: Okay okay.

Executive: Rest sir aapke do product inactive state mein pade hain wo main jaan sakta hun kyun pade hue hain?

Customer: Kya cheez?

Executive: Aapke do product sir inactive state mein pade hain aapne unko inactive mark kara hua hai. Aap unme deal nahi kar rahe ho ya phir out of stock hai sir wo?

Customer: Nahi hai.

Executive: Main aapko bata deta hun. Leviholic 300 under oxide acidic tablet aur 100 gram garg acidic capsule. Ye dono product.

Customer: Main check kar leta hun abhi kya kya tha aapko. Dekh leta hun main check kar leta hun.

Executive: Product pe jaaiye rest sir jo aapka concern tha wo main close kar raha hun. I hope abhi aap satisfied hain?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: To sir main aapka concern jo aaya hua tha usko close kar raha hun. To aapke paas proper mail jayega sir. If you are satisfied you mark satisfied over there.

Customer: Okay.

Executive: Aap satisfied hain sir? Haan ji haan ji satisfied. Haan. To aapko pata chal gaya aapka jo problem tha jo aapne open kara tha ticket sir uske regarding mein main aapko connect kara. Aapki problem resolve kar di. Abhi sir main is ticket ko close karne ja raha hun. To I hope aapke paas mail jayega. To please as a please if you are satisfied please mark satisfied over there okay? Haan ji.

Executive: Okay sir thank you.

Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving irrelevant leads.

- Customer states that leads are fake.

- Unable to provide feedback on leads.

- Two products are in inactive state.



Resolution:

- Explained how AI generates leads.

- Explained how to provide feedback on leads.

- Confirmed feedback was already submitted.

- Offered to show how to submit feedback via link.

- Asked to check inactive products.

- Closing the ticket and customer will receive mail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark satisfied on the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, inactive products, lead manager
